name: Billy Candy
description:
Story

Billy is a gecko, and he loves candies, specially lollipops. Help him get all the lollipops while avoiding obstacles and using mysterious items to advantage (or not!)

Gameplay

Help Billy get to the lollipop to clear the stage.

You'll need to pickup items to get trough some obstacles, but beware! While some items will help you, others can cause trouble!

Commands
  • Move: arrow keys or w/a/s/d
  • R: restart stage
